lead_paragraph: In a federal lawsuit filed against St. Joseph’s, a former member of the softball team alleges that she was subjected to sexually charged hazing in 2013.

headline.main: Hazing Suit Filed Against St. Joseph’s

snippet: In a federal lawsuit filed against St. Joseph’s, a former member of the softball team alleges that she was subjected to sexually charged hazing in 2013.
abstract: Former softball player for St Joseph's files lawsuit against the university for allegedly being subjected to sexually charged hazing.
